definition: term of respect for your teacher's wife

sentences.english: With trees and flowers everywhere, living conditions can be improved.
sentences.chinese: 到處師母環繞鮮花芬芳，生活條件就得到極大的改善。

sentences.english: Please pray for the trip of Pastor Sam & Jeannie.
Sister Tan Ay Eeng was the song leader of that night.
sentences.chinese: 當晚的領唱是陳愛螢師母。

sentences.english: Damema assisted him to join a teaching session but still he got kicked out by Marpa.
sentences.chinese: 師母幫他混進別人求法的教學裏，還是被趕了出去。

sentences.english: Pastor Pai and wife will be attending.
sentences.chinese: 牧師與師母將前往參加。

sentences.english: Mrs. Ko is still recovering in California.
sentences.chinese: 高師母仍在加州休養復原。

sentences.english: On the way out they bump into the pastor's wife.
sentences.chinese: 他們出來的時候碰上師母。

sentences.english: Rev. Yew and wife Maryann have two sons and four grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 遊牧師與師母陳慈愛女士共有兩位兒子以及四名孫兒。

definition: senior female fellow student or apprentice/daughter (older than oneself) of one's teacher

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to enumerate sb's shortcomings/to criticize/to scold/to talk on and on
